biotools.summary: 516 unique variants and 831 patients registered in an updated centralized Variome database | OPA1 (optic atrophy 1 (autosomal dominant)) | Autosomal dominant optic atrophy (DOA, Kjer type, MIM#165500) is characterized by moderate to severe loss of visual acuity with insidious onset in early childhood, blue-yellow dyschromatopsia and central scotoma
